comments:
Have a few perspectives open, do a Close All, then File->Exit .
On restart, one gets the message: 

"Unable to read workbench state. Workbench UI layout will be reset."           
             

And the .log contains:
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

--------------
The question is why should this be flagged as an error/warning?
It could be normal operation for some ...

Just want to confirm you are running Eclipse release 2.0 (not 2.1, or latest 
integration build)
This happens on WSAD 5.0, which is shipped with Eclipse 2.0.

This problem was fixed for the 2.1 release. (by the way, the problem is present 
in 2.0, 2.0.1, and 2.0.2)
